title: Resource Type: Programare
text:
# Resource Type: Programare

**Document Type:** resource-type
**Resource Type:** appointment
**Business Type:** dental

---

**Display Name:** Programare
**Description:** Programări pentru consultații și tratamente
**Resource Id Format:** apt_XXXXX sau UUID

**IMPORTANT:** Structura appointment folosește **services** (PLURAL, ARRAY) nu service (singular)!

**Data Schema:**

  **Date:**
    **Type:** string
    **Format:** YYYY-MM-DD
    **Required:** true
    **Description:** Data programării

  **Time:**
    **Type:** string
    **Format:** HH:mm
    **Required:** true
    **Description:** Ora programării

  **Doctor:**
    **Type:** object
    **Required:** true
    **Aliases:** medic (pentru căutare folosește data.doctor.name sau data.medic.name)

    **Properties:**

      **Id:**
        **Type:** string
        **Required:** true
        **Description:** ID-ul medicului (UUID)

      **Name:**
        **Type:** string
        **Required:** true
        **Description:** Numele complet al medicului
        **Search Fields:** data.doctor.name, data.medic.name

  **Patient:**
    **Type:** object
    **Required:** true

    **Properties:**

      **Id:**
        **Type:** string
        **Required:** true
        **Description:** ID-ul pacientului (format: pa2508-00007)

      **Name:**
        **Type:** string
        **Required:** true
        **Description:** Numele complet al pacientului
        **Search Fields:** data.patient.name

  **Services:**
    **Type:** array
    **Required:** true
    **Description:** Array de servicii/tratamente pentru această programare (IMPORTANT: PLURAL!)
    **Note:** În versiunile vechi poate fi "service" (singular object), dar noua structură este "services" (plural array)

    **Items:**
      **Type:** object

      **Properties:**

        **Id:**
          **Type:** string
          **Required:** true
          **Description:** ID-ul serviciului/tratamentului (format: tr2508-00005)

        **Name:**
          **Type:** string
          **Required:** true
          **Description:** Numele tratamentului
          **Search Fields:** data.services[].name, data.service.name (backward compatibility)

        **Duration:**
          **Type:** number
          **Required:** true
          **Description:** Durata în minute (number)

        **Price:**
          **Type:** number
          **Required:** false
          **Description:** Prețul serviciului

  **Price:**
    **Type:** number
    **Required:** false
    **Default:** 0
    **Description:** Prețul total al programării

  **Status:**
    **Type:** string

    **Enum:**
      - scheduled
      - confirmed
      - completed
      - cancelled
      - no_show
    **Default:** scheduled
    **Description:** Statusul programării
    **Search Field:** data.status

  **Prescription:**
    **Type:** string
    **Required:** false
    **Default:** 
    **Description:** Prescripție medicală

  **Post Operative Notes:**
    **Type:** string
    **Required:** false
    **Default:** 
    **Description:** Note post-operatorii

  **Images:**
    **Type:** array
    **Required:** false

    **Default:**
    **Description:** Array cu imagini (URLs sau referințe)

  **Created At:**
    **Type:** string
    **Format:** ISO8601
    **Auto:** true
    **Description:** Data creării (auto-generated)

  **Updated At:**
    **Type:** string
    **Format:** ISO8601
    **Auto:** true
    **Description:** Data ultimei actualizări (auto-generated)

**NESTED FIELD SEARCH:**
Pentru căutarea în appointments folosește următoarele câmpuri nested:
- data.patient.name - Numele pacientului din appointment
- data.doctor.name sau data.medic.name - Numele medicului
- data.status - Status programare
- data.services[].name - Numele serviciilor (pentru array)
- data.service.name - Pentru backward compatibility cu structura veche
- startDate, endDate - Pentru filtrare după dată

**Full Resource Example (NEW STRUCTURE):**
  **Id:** B0100001-L0100001-apt_12345
  **Business Id:** B0100001
  **Location Id:** L0100001
  **Resource Type:** appointment
  **Resource Id:** apt_12345

  **Data:**
    **Date:** 2025-10-01
    **Time:** 08:40

    **Doctor:**
      **Id:** 33948842-b061-7036-f02f-79b9c0b4225b
      **Name:** Dr. George Bush

    **Patient:**
      **Id:** pa2508-00007
      **Name:** Cristi Geamanu

    **Services:**
      - **Id:** tr2508-00005
        **Name:** Consultatie Ortodontica
        **Duration:** 15
        **Price:** 150
      - **Id:** tr2508-00006
        **Name:** Detartraj
        **Duration:** 30
        **Price:** 200

    **Price:** 350
    **Status:** scheduled
    **Prescription:** 
    **Post Operative Notes:** 

    **Images:**
    **Created At:** 2025-10-01T01:42:00.176Z
    **Updated At:** 2025-10-01T01:42:00.176Z
  **Timestamp:** 2025-10-01T01:42:00.176Z
  **Last Updated:** 2025-10-01T01:42:00.176Z

**Frontend Function Example (NEW STRUCTURE):**
  **Description:** Când creezi o resursă prin call_frontend_function, trimiți DOAR câmpul 'data'
  **Function Name:** createResource

  **Parameters:**
    **Resource Type:** appointment

    **Data:**
      **Date:** 2025-10-20
      **Time:** 14:00

      **Doctor:**
        **Id:** 33948842-b061-7036-f02f-79b9c0b4225b
        **Name:** Dr. Tucean

      **Patient:**
        **Id:** pa2508-00007
        **Name:** Ion Popescu

      **Services:**
        - **Id:** tr2508-00005
          **Name:** Consultatie
          **Duration:** 30
          **Price:** 150

      **Price:** 150
      **Status:** scheduled
